content: This is a **list of [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) political [dissidents](/wiki/Dissident)** since (/wiki/1959_Singaporean_general_election). ## Detained by Operation Coldstore (1963) and Spectrum (1987) - [Chia Thye Poh](/wiki/Chia_Thye_Poh), [Operation Coldstore](/wiki/Operation_Coldstore) detainee - [Lim Chin Siong](/wiki/Lim_Chin_Siong), [Operation Coldstore](/wiki/Operation_Coldstore) detainee - [Said Zahari](/wiki/Said_Zahari), [Operation Coldstore](/wiki/Operation_Coldstore) detainee - [Fong Swee Suan](/wiki/Fong_Swee_Suan), [Operation Coldstore](/wiki/Operation_Coldstore) detainee - [James Puthucheary](/wiki/James_Puthucheary), [Operation Coldstore](/wiki/Operation_Coldstore) detainee - [Lim Hock Siew](/wiki/Lim_Hock_Siew), [Operation Coldstore](/wiki/Operation_Coldstore) detainee - [Linda Chen](/wiki/Linda_Chen), [Operation Coldstore](/wiki/Operation_Coldstore) detainee - [Poh Soo Kai](/wiki/Poh_Soo_Kai), [Operation Coldstore](/wiki/Operation_Coldstore) detainee - [Sandrasegaran Woodhull](/wiki/Sandrasegaran_Woodhull), [Operation Coldstore](/wiki/Operation_Coldstore) detainee - [Tan Wah Piow](/wiki/Tan_Wah_Piow), alleged [Operation Spectrum](/wiki/Operation_Spectrum) mastermind - [Tang Fong Har](/wiki/Tang_Fong_Har), [Operation Spectrum](/wiki/Operation_Spectrum) detainee - [Vincent Cheng Kim Chuan](/wiki/Vincent_Cheng_Kim_Chuan), [Operation Spectrum](/wiki/Operation_Spectrum) detainee ## Other dissidents - [J. B. Jeyaretnam](/wiki/J._B._Jeyaretnam) - [Lee Siew Choh](/wiki/Lee_Siew_Choh) - [Tang Liang Hong](/wiki/Tang_Liang_Hong) - [Francis Seow](/wiki/Francis_Seow) - [Chee Soon Juan](/wiki/Chee_Soon_Juan) - [Martyn See](/wiki/Martyn_See) - [M Ravi](/wiki/M_Ravi) - [Kirsten Han](/wiki/Kirsten_Han) - [Thum Ping Tjin](/wiki/Thum_Ping_Tjin) - [Alex Tan](/wiki/Alex_Tan) - [Roy Ngerng](/wiki/Roy_Ngerng) - [Jolovan Wham](/wiki/Jolovan_Wham) - [Han Hui Hui](/wiki/Han_Hui_Hui) - [Charles Yeo](/wiki/Charles_Yeo) - [Amos Yee](/wiki/Amos_Yee) - [Internal Security Act](/wiki/Internal_Security_Act_(Singapore)) - [List of Singaporeans](/wiki/List_of_Singaporeans) - [Human rights in Singapore](/wiki/Human_rights_in_Singapore) - Human Rights Watch: Info by country: Singapore - Overview of Human Rights Developments 1989 - IFEX: Censorship in Singapore
title: List of Singaporean dissidents
